errors.unexpected_error: Unexpected error occurred.  Maybe the server is down, if the error persists. Please use the feedback button to send us a message.
errors.language_tool_error: Error with language tool. This is a internal error, if the error persists. Please use the feedback button to send us a message.

auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to continue to your account
auth.azureAdDescription: We're securely connecting you to Azure Active Directory. This will only take a moment.

rewrite.noRewrite: Select text and click "Rewrite" to rewrite it
rewrite.advancedOptionsLabel: Here you can write your custom rewrite rules

advisor.title: Document Advisor
advisor.description: Check your text against selected documents
advisor.noResultsYet: Run a check to see results

custom.label: Custom Instructions
custom.placeholder: Enter your custom rewrite instructions here...

plain-language.notice: Note: This tool is a support tool and does not replace a complete manual review. We recommend that all automatically generated texts be reviewed again before publication.

pwa.newVersionDescription: A new version of the app is available. Please refresh to get the latest updates.

upload.dropFileToConvert: For upload, drop the file here
upload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: DOC, DOCX, HTML, MD, PDF, PPTX, RTF, TXT
upload.errorDescription: Error uploading file. Please try again or contact us.

rewrite-diff-viewer.clickToUndo: Click on the changes to undo them
rewrite-diff-viewer.noChangesYet: No changes yet. When the text is rewritten by textmate, the changes will be highlighted here.

welcome.title: Welcome to Text Mate!
welcome.content: Here you can switch between three modes:  Rewrite to leverage AI for text enhancement, Problems to see and fix grammar and spelling errors, and Review to check your text against guideline documents.

problemsIntro.title: Spelling and Grammar Problems
problemsIntro.content: Textmate helps you find and fix grammar and spelling errors in your text.

language.title: Language Selection
language.content: Choose the proofing language for your text. This helps the grammar and spelling checker provide accurate suggestions for the selected language.

dictionary.title: Personal Dictionary
dictionary.content: Add words that should be ignored during spelling checks. This is useful for specialized terminology, names, or words that are correct but not in the standard dictionary.

editor.title: Text Editor
editor.content: This is where you write and edit your text. The editor provides real-time grammar and spelling checking as you type.

wordCount.title: Text Statistics
wordCount.content: View detailed information about your text including word count, character count, and Flesch reading ease score. Click on these statistics to see more details about your text's readability.

problems.title: Problems Panel
problems.content: Here you can see all grammar and spelling problems in your text. Use the arrow keys to quickly navigate to each problem in the text. Or hover over the underlined words in the text to see suggestions. You can also add a word directly to the dictionary.

textEditorToolpanel.title: Text Editor Tools
textEditorToolpanel.content: Here you can undo or redo your changes. Additionally, you can upload a document, which will be converted to text and opened in the editor.

rewriteOptions.title: Rewrite Options
rewriteOptions.content: Define here how your text should be rewritten. Customize writing style, target audience, intent, and medium to suit your needs.

rewriteToolpanel.title: Accept or Reject Rewrite Actions
rewriteToolpanel.content: Here you can undo the last rewrite action or accept all changes.

rewrite.title: AI Text Rewriting
rewrite.content: When a text action is executed, the changes appear here. Click on a change to undo it or on the checkmark below to accept all changes.

advisor.title: Document Advisor
advisor.content: Select a policy according to which you want to check your document. The document advisor will show you the violations it found against the selected policy.

quickActions.title: Rewrite Actions
quickActions.content: Perform text actions such as summaries or rewrites. Select an action to apply it to your text.

conclusion.title: That's it!
conclusion.content: You are now ready to make full use of Text Mate. Feel free to restart the tour if you forget something. Have fun writing!
